label: 小笠原長行
本: The Meiji Restoration . Stanford University Press . 1972
見出し読み: おがさわら ながみち
見出し読み_mod: おがさわら ながみち
説明文: (1822-91). Eldest son of fudai daimyo (Karatsu; 60,000 koku; never succeeded). Bakufu official; Roju, 1865-66, 1866-68. Worked closely with Tokugawa Keiki. Joined Enomoto Takeaki in Hokkaido, 1868-69.
